name: Rebound Ball
description:
An arcade game. You have to use the ball to destroy figures on the level to go further.
Use the mouse or keyboard (WASD) to control the platform and hit the ball. If you miss the ball, then the level will begin again.



  • In the game you will find 50 levels of different difficulty.
  • Beautiful atmosphere
  • Interesting bonuses that will help you
  • Traps trying to hurt you
  • Time will fly by!

Earn points, multiply them with your reaction, because each level is your personal record!
